content.raw:
Hi Alfredo,

Thanks for updating this! Teleoperation is working fine for me now with both the docker and local installs. I think I was just missing the first roslaunch \(I should have realized that would still be the same as before, guess I was assuming that it was somehow changed to be part of the `ign launch` now\). I can see the velocity output from both of those commands, and the robot moves as expected.
content.html:
Hi Alfredo,

Thanks for updating this! Teleoperation is working fine for me now with both the docker and local installs. I think I was just missing the first roslaunch (I should have realized that would still be the same as before, guess I was assuming that it was somehow changed to be part of the ign launch now). I can see the velocity output from both of those commands, and the robot moves as expected.
